page.title: 10EARDISLEY C.OF E.SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called{Eardisley C.of E. {school}.It has about 98 children in it whose ages range from 5-11.Our school is in the village but very close to the countryside.Children come from Eardisley,Willersley,Winforton and Witney so many of them have to travel on a minibus or come by car.We have 4 classrooms and 4{teachers}including the{headmaster}The school was built in 1857 although 10 years ago a new hall and 2 new classrooms were built so it is quite modern really.Every summer we have a fete and sports day to help raise money for the school fund.At school we do Maths.,English,P.E.,Art, Television,Craft,Nature,Spellings and once a week we travel 15 miles to Leominster to go to the swimming pool. Sometimes we have a fire practice.It is quite a big school for a country school.We have a big field.
